definition: to have a pleasant journey (idiom)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
surname Lu
road/CL:條|条[tiao2]/journey/route/line (bus etc)/sort/kind
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable
wind/news/style/custom/manner/CL:陣|阵[zhen4],絲|丝[si1]

sentences.english: Dear colleagues, a pleasant journey, I remember thinking of us, always come back together sometime.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的同事，一路顺风，记得想念我们，常回来聚聚。

sentences.english: May you have favorable winds on the way.
I wish you a safe journey.
These are cars which show you've arrived and had a good time along the way.
sentences.chinese: 这样的车可以显示你已功成名就，并且一路顺风顺水。

sentences.english: I hope you'll have a very pleasant journey.
sentences.chinese: 祝你一路顺风旅途快活。

sentences.english: My honey, i wish you a pleasant journey , and please take care.
sentences.chinese: 我亲爱的，祝你一路顺风，请多多保重。

sentences.english: Goodbye and have a good flight.
This is from Nick and Sue. They send their best wishes.
sentences.chinese: 这个是尼克和苏给你的，他们也祝你一路顺风。

sentences.english: The priest blessed the ship before it left port.
sentences.chinese: 牧师祈祷上帝保佑那艘船一路顺风。

definition: to have a pleasant journey/Bon voyage!
with the current
lit. to win a victory on raising the flag (idiom); fig. to start on sth and have immediate success/success in a single move
propitious wind throughout the journey (idiom)/plain sailing/to go smoothly/have a nice trip!
to congratulate beforehand/to offer best wishes for
everything is going smoothly/just as one wishes
surname Zhu
to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard
bon voyage/Godspeed
to have one's wishes come true/wish you the best!
smoothly/without a hitch
to have all one's wishes (idiom)/best wishes/all the best/may all your hopes be fulfilled
to take care of oneself
I'm sure we'll meet again some day. (idiom)/Hope to see you again.
to be successful in one's studies/academic success
to have a future full of promise
if only it were so/I hope so (idiom)
